payments

Class MobileService

  • java.lang.Object
    • payments.MobileService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operations
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PostpaidService, PrepaidService

    public abstract class MobileService
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operations
    This abstract class contains attributes and methods required for a mobile service.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) ConnectionAccount account
      An attribute of type ConnectionAccount that stores the customer information.
      (package private) double balance
      An attribute of type double that stores the balance of customer in $(dollars).
      (package private) double dataAvailable
      An attribute of type double that stores the available data in Mega Bytes (MB) for a customer.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MobileService(ConnectionAccount account, double balance, double data)
      An all argument constructor that initializes all the instance variables of this class.

      The method is used to update the amount of data available as the user uses mobile data or internet services.

      • MobileService

        public MobileService(ConnectionAccount account,
                     double balance,
                     double data)

        account - parameter variable of type ConnectionAccount that holds the details of the customer.
        balance - parameter of type double to pass the balance of the customer.
        data - parameter of type double to pass the available data the customer in Mega Bytes (MB)

      • canMakeCall

        public abstract boolean canMakeCall()
        This method overrides the abstract method declared in Operations interface. This abstract method is used to check whether the customer can make a call.
        Specified by:
        canMakeCall in interface Operations
        Returns:
        a value of type boolean

        This method overrides the abstract method declared in Operations interface. This abstract method is used to make a call.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        This overridden method returns the details of the customer. A sample output is given below.
        Customer Name  :Tom Cruise
        Phone Number  :(+1)911-999-9955
        Connection Type  :prepaid
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        Details of a call as String object

      • useData

        public boolean useData(double dataUsed)

        The method is used to update the amount of data available as the user uses mobile data or internet services. It takes amount of data used in Kilo Bytes(KB) as input argument of type double. If there is enough data available for use, this method deducts the data used from available data and returns true.

        i.e For example if available data is 1000 kB
        data usage is 100 kB it returns true
        but if data usage is 1250 kB it returns false as there is not enough data

        Specified by:
        useData in interface Operations
        Parameters:
        dataUsed - the argument of double type
        Returns:
        a value of type boolean
